DOC.brief_summary: Chest compression ( CC ) feedback device use perform CC measurement effectively accurately patient hospital bed . However , device take account compression mattress , result overestimation CC depth . This study validation study demonstrate new method use one accelerometer ( U-cpr ) useful overcome limitation thus measure compression depth accurately perform cardiopulmonary resuscitation ( CPR ) patient .
DOC.brief_title: The Manikin Study Chest Compression With One Accelerometer Feedback Device
DOC.detailed_description: Data collection The participant divide three group random drawing . Each performer three-groups compress chest manikin bed real-time 5cm,6cm 7cm feed-back one accelerometer ( U-cpr ) .We use two bed [ Stryker ST104-747 ( Transport stretcher® , 760 x 2110 mm , 228 kg , Stryker Co. , Kalamazoo , Michigan , US ) , Shinchang SB-34p ( Transport stretcher® , 850 x 2080 mm , Shinchang Co. , Busan , ROK ) ] . Each participant 6 cycle chest compression 1cyle 2minutes . Between cycle , participant take rest 5minutes .
DOC.criteria: Postgraduates year 1,2,3,4 Emergency physician emergency department Wrist Low back disease
